name: mega-aide
description: Things learned and things to remember for my Megacade

scripts.neu:update: echo 'Will not update neu due to how it overwrites /bin files'
scripts.copy:webapp: npm run copy:webapp:dist && npm run copy:webapp:node-app
scripts.build: npm run build:webapp && npm run neu:update && npm run build:neutralino
scripts.build:neutralino: neu build --release && npm run dist:rename:mac && npm run dist:move
scripts.build:webapp: cd webapp && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run build:resources && npm run copy:webapp
scripts.build:resources: npm run resources:copy && npm run resources:write
scripts.dist:rename:mac: mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_x64 dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_x64.app && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_universal dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_universal.app && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_arm64 dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_arm64.app
scripts.dist:clear: rm -rf dist/mega-aide/mac && rm -rf dist/mega-aide/windows && rm -rf dist/mega-aide/linux
scripts.dist:folders: mkdir dist/mega-aide/mac && mkdir dist/mega-aide/windows && mkdir dist/mega-aide/linux
scripts.dist:move: npm run dist:clear && npm run dist:folders && npm run dist:linux && npm run dist:mac && npm run dist:win && npm run dist:resources
scripts.dist:linux: mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-linux_x64 dist/mega-aide/linux/mega-aide-linux_x64 && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-linux_arm64 dist/mega-aide/linux/mega-aide-linux_arm64 && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-linux_armhf dist/mega-aide/linux/mega-aide-linux_armhf
scripts.dist:mac: mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_x64.app dist/mega-aide/mac/mega-aide-mac_x64.app && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_universal.app dist/mega-aide/mac/mega-aide-mac_universal.app && mv dist/mega-aide/mega-aide-mac_arm64.app dist/mega-aide/mac/mega-aide-mac_arm64.app
scripts.dist:resources: cp dist/mega-aide/resources.neu dist/mega-aide/windows/resources.neu && cp dist/mega-aide/resources.neu dist/mega-aide/mac/resources.neu && cp dist/mega-aide/resources.neu dist/mega-aide/linux/resources.neu && rm dist/mega-aide/resources.neu
